title: Shadow Warrior [PC-MSDOS]
description:
Shadow Warrior by 3DRealms
==== Story
Lo Wang.  Master ninja assassin for 20 years. A Shadow Warrior.
Shadow warriors are the best of the best, and Lo Wang was the best
of the Shadow warriors.  Every top company in Japan had a shadow
warrior... a protector, a negotiator, a cleaner.

Lo Wang worked for Zilla Enterprises, a conglomerate with control
in every major industry.  Too much control.  Power corrupts, and
Master Zilla's corporation was corrupted to the core.

Lo Wang discovered Master Zilla's demonic scheme to rule Japan,
using creatures summoned from the dark side.  A man of honor, Lo
Wang quit.  But one as powerful as Wang either must be on your side,
or on no one's side.  Master Zilla unleashes his creations for their
first test: to kill a single man, a shadow warrior..  Lo Wang!
====
==== Tools you need when installing
You can either Daemon Tools or MagicISO (or software that works the
same) to either mount or open up IMAGE files. In any case, you will
need WinRAR to open up the compressed files
====
==== Installing
If you intend to use the Windows Engine, just extract the file
"jfsw_20051009.zip" to a folder of your selection, and then copy
"swinst/sw.grp" from "shadowwarrior.img".
If you intend to be oldskool, then run "install.exe" after you have
mounted the CD ;)
====
==== Notice
This is a re-upload of an older torrent uploaded on ThePirateBay,
but I added the JFSW engine so you can play it on Windows 2000/XP.
Please read the readme.txt for that engine, as it's not complete.
====
